Hi, I'm Toe Aung Ye Yint, a front-end developer with a diverse educational background who is driven and skilled. I have a Master in Information Technology in addition to my Bachelor of Architecture, which gives me a distinctive perspective on design and aesthetics. With expertise in both Architecture and Information Technology, I am equipped to create compelling user interfaces that captivate and delight users.

In addition to my educational background, I have gained valuable work experience, most notably, at the Monash University, Faculty of Engineering (August 17, 2022 - current) as an Online Content Officer, where I collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance the user experience and engagement on the university's website. Through my front-end development skills, I played a pivotal role in integrating content, design, and functionality to create an immersive digital experience for users.

Lastly, but certainly not least, my area of expertise is in utilising JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to convert design principles into functional and responsive interfaces. I excel in creating clean, efficient, and maintainable code that adheres to industry best practices. As a dedicated front-end developer, I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and emerging technologies.
